summary: Depressed Alain Leroy leaves the clinic where he was detoxified. He meets friends, acquaintances and women, trying to find a reason to continue living. Will this help him?
cast: Maurice Ronet|Léna Skerla|Yvonne Clech|Hubert Deschamps|Jean-Paul Moulinot|Mona Dol|Pierre Moncorbier|René Dupuy|Bernard Tiphaine|Bernard Noël|Ursula Kubler|Jeanne Moreau|Alain Mottet|François Gragnon|Romain Bouteille|Jacques Sereys|Alexandra Stewart|Claude Deschamps|Tony Taffin|Henri Serre|Madeleine Declercq|Claude Deleusse|Darling Légitimus|Michèle Mahaut|Vera Valdez
title: El fuego fatuo
